name: Simon the Sorcerer 2: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe
name_original: Simon the Sorcerer 2: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe
description:
Simon the Sorcerer 2: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe is an adventure game developed by Adventure Soft. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Headfirst Productions. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Simon the Sorcerer 2: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe is available on PC.
